constituent: cry, water, water droplets, water pistol, vase, stand up
heisigStory: One cries and cries until one is standing up knee-deep in water (or until one has a vase-full of water).
koohiiStory1: Guys have two ways of watering when they are standing, the less common one is crying.
koohiiStory2: She stood up to leave the room when her eyes started to water...
myStory: khóc. đứng mà chảy nước tức là khóc
